original_text: Arise and thresh, O daughter of Zion: for I will make thine horn iron, and I will make thy hoofs brass: and thou shalt beat in pieces many people: and I will consecrate their gain unto the Lord, and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth.
korean_text: 딸 시온이여 일어나서 칠지어다 내가 네 뿔을 무쇠 같게 하며 네 굽을 놋 같게 하리니 네가 여러 백성을 쳐서 깨뜨릴 것이라 네가 그들의 탈취물을 구별하여 여호와께 드리며 그들의 재물을 온 땅의 주께 돌리리라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: Arise and thresh, O daughter of Zion:
for I will make thine horn iron,
and I will make thy hoofs brass:
and thou shalt beat in pieces many people:
and I will consecrate their gain unto the Lord,
and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth.
and their substance unto the Lord of the whole earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 재산을 온 땅의 주이신 여호와께 바치리라
